definitions.definition: A narrow strip of land , bordered on both sides by water , and connecting two larger landmasses .
Any such narrow part connecting two larger structures .
An edge in a graph whose deletion increases the number of connected components of the graph.

main_definition: ( geography ) A narrow strip of land , bordered on both sides by water , and connecting two larger landmasses .
secondary_definitions: ( anatomy , botany ) Any such narrow part connecting two larger structures .
( graph theory ) An edge in a graph whose deletion increases the number of connected components of the graph.
